content: **gauge** with a size 0 steel hook each motif is 2 square and you will get the smaller size dress for the bigger size use a 3 5 mm hook for a motif 2 25 square **yarn required** 6 oz of baby yarn in main color 2 oz in contrast color **additional materials** 3 white 3/8 shank buttons 48 elastic thread tapestry needle free-crochet 1 1 https //www free-crochet com/crochet_for_babies_and_children/granny_yoke_baby_dress/
